definitions.definition: The butterfat or milkfat part of milk which rises to the top; this part when separated from the remainder.
examples: Take 100 ml of cream and 50 grams of sugar…

subdefinitions.definition: The liquid separated from milk, possibly with certain other milk products added, and with at least eighteen percent of it milkfat .
The liquid separated from milk containing at least 18 percent milkfat (48% for double cream).
A portion of cream, such as the amount found in a creamer .
examples: I take my coffee with two cream and three sugar.

definitions.definition: A yellowish white color ; the color of cream.
Frosting , custard , creamer , or another substance similar to the oily part of milk or to whipped cream .
A dish prepared through creaming, particularly cream of

examples: the cream of a collection of books or pictures

definitions.definition: A viscous aqueous oil or fat emulsion with a medicament added , used to apply that medicament to the skin . (compare with ointment )
examples: You look really sunburnt; you should apply some cream .

definitions.definition: The chrism or consecrated oil used in anointing ceremonies.

main_definition: The butterfat or milkfat part of milk which rises to the top; this part when separated from the remainder.
secondary_definitions: A yellowish white color ; the color of cream.
( informal ) Frosting , custard , creamer , or another substance similar to the oily part of milk or to whipped cream .
A dish prepared through creaming, particularly cream of
( figuratively ) The best part of something.
( medicine ) A viscous aqueous oil or fat emulsion with a medicament added , used to apply that medicament to the skin . (compare with ointment )
( obsolete ) The chrism or consecrated oil used in anointing ceremonies.
